definitions.definition: to put; to lay; to place; to set; to position; to install; to implant

parsedExamples.example: وَضَعْتُ يَدَيَّ عَلَى أُذْنَيَّ فَمَا سَمِعْتُ قَوْلَهُ.
parsedExamples.transliteration: waḍaʿtu yadayya ʿalā ʾuḏnayya famā samiʿtu qawlahu.
parsedExamples.translation: I put my hands on my ears and did not hear what he said.

examples: وَضَعْتُ يَدَيَّ عَلَى أُذْنَيَّ فَمَا سَمِعْتُ قَوْلَهُ.
